feed.title: Zenithrane blog
feed.subtitle: 写一些乱七八糟的东西，做一个不明不白的人！

entry.title: 畅行unit3听力材料
entry.content:
Unit three, 单元检测

一、听力

(一)听句子，选图片。你将听到五个句子，请选出与所听句子内容相符的图片，有一幅图是多余的。每个句子读两遍。

1

I often wake up to the smell of porridge.

I often wake up to the smell of porridge.

2

How to cook scrambled eggs with tomatoes?

How to cook scrambled eggs with tomatoes?

3

There is a little fish and it tastes delicious.

There is a little fish and it tastes delicious.

4

Eating carrots will give you better eyesight.

Eating carrots will give you better eyesight.

5

The smell of coffee remained strong.

The smell of coffee remained strong.

(二)听短对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到五段对话，每段对话后有一个小题，请根据对话内容，选出最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

6

I am reading a passage about a new kind of snack. It's made from chicken. Do you know anything about it?

No, I don't, and I don't like snacks at all.

I am reading a passage about a new kind of snack. It's made from chicken. Do you know anything about it?

No, I don't, and I don't like snacks at all.

7

Dad, I often have a sore throat.

Pear syrup with honey is good for our throat.

Dad, I often have a sore throat.

Pear syrup with honey is good for our throat.

8

Mom, I was too busy to drink any water.

You should drink eight cups of water a day.

Mom, I was too busy to drink any water.

You should drink eight cups of water a day.

9

It's a nice day. Let's go out to play. I have some candies, some hamburgers and…

Those aren't very healthy, Peter. Please bring some fruits.

It's a nice day. Let's go out to play. I have some candies, some hamburgers and…

Those aren't very healthy, Peter. Please bring some fruits.

10

David, do you have any favourite food memories?

My mother always cooks plain rice porridge for me when I fall ill.

David, do you have any favourite food memories?

My mother always cooks plain rice porridge for me when I fall ill.

(三)听长对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到三段对话，请根据对话内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

请听第一段对话，回答第11至13小题。

Do you like ice­cream, Judy?

No, I don't like it. You know, it's not healthy, Jack.

We have fruit, eggs and hamburgers. What food do you think is healthy?

My favourite is fruit and eggs. I think they're healthy.

Sure. But my favourite is chicken. I often have chicken salad for lunch.

Do you like ice­cream, Judy?

No, I don't like it. You know, it's not healthy, Jack.

We have fruit, eggs and hamburgers. What food do you think is healthy?

My favourite is fruit and eggs. I think they're healthy.

Sure. But my favourite is chicken. I often have chicken salad for lunch.

请听第二段对话，回答第14至16小题。

Good morning, Bill. What do you have for breakfast?

Good morning, Alice. I usually have some bread and milk. How about you?

I like rice and vegetables for breakfast. Do you like fruit?

No, I don't.

It is good to have some fruit and vegetables every day.

I know. I have a lot of vegetables and chicken for lunch.

That's good. I like playing baseball. Do you do any sports every day?

Yes, I do. I like running after school, but my brother Jim doesn't do any sports. And he often eats a lot of hamburgers.

Good morning, Bill. What do you have for breakfast?

Good morning, Alice. I usually have some bread and milk. How about you?

I like rice and vegetables for breakfast. Do you like fruit?

No, I don't.

It is good to have some fruit and vegetables every day.

I know. I have a lot of vegetables and chicken for lunch.

That's good. I like playing baseball. Do you do any sports every day?

Yes, I do. I like running after school, but my brother Jim doesn't do any sports. And he often eats a lot of hamburgers.

请听第三段对话，回答第17 至20小题。

Hello, Cindy! What do you like for breakfast?

I love fruit. I think it is healthy.

What fruit do you like?

I like oranges and bananas.

Do you like strawberries?

No, I don't.

Do you like salad?

Yes, I do. I often have some vegetable salad in the evening.

Oh, you really have a healthy eating habit.

Thank you.

Hello, Cindy! What do you like for breakfast?

I love fruit. I think it is healthy.

What fruit do you like?

I like oranges and bananas.

Do you like strawberries?

No, I don't.

Do you like salad?

Yes, I do. I often have some vegetable salad in the evening.

Oh, you really have a healthy eating habit.

Thank you.

(四)听短文，选择最佳答案。你将听到一篇短文，请根据短文内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。短文读两遍。

Most English people eat four meals a day. They have breakfast at any time from 7:00 to 9:00 in the morning. They usually eat eggs or bread and drink tea or coffee for breakfast. Lunch usually comes at about 1 o'clock. Some of them eat in the restaurant and some of them eat at home. Afternoon tea is from 4:00 to 5:00. Dinner is at about half past seven. In some families, they like eating well in the evening, because they are usually very busy in the day. First they usually have soup, and then they have meat or fish with vegetables for the big meal. After that, they eat some other things like bananas, apples or ice cream.

Most English people eat four meals a day. They have breakfast at any time from 7:00 to 9:00 in the morning. They usually eat eggs or bread and drink tea or coffee for breakfast. Lunch usually comes at about 1 o'clock. Some of them eat in the restaurant and some of them eat at home. Afternoon tea is from 4:00 to 5:00. Dinner is at about half past seven. In some families, they like eating well in the evening, because they are usually very busy in the day. First they usually have soup, and then they have meat or fish with vegetables for the big meal. After that, they eat some other things like bananas, apples or ice cream.

(五)听短文，填信息。你将听到一篇短文，请根据短文内容，将所缺信息填入对应的横线上，每空一词。短文读三遍。

Good morning, everyone. I'm Miss Li. Here is the report of our eating survey. There are forty students in the survey. Most students eat healthy food. However, a lot of students don't have healthy snacks or drinks. More than half of the students drink enough water every day but a lot of students have more than two drinks with sugar. Our snacks are not healthy. Most students eat junk food as snacks, but a lot of students have some fruit every day. And most students like to eat apples, bananas and pears.

Good morning, everyone. I'm Miss Li. Here is the report of our eating survey. There are forty students in the survey. Most students eat healthy food. However, a lot of students don't have healthy snacks or drinks. More than half of the students drink enough water every day but a lot of students have more than two drinks with sugar. Our snacks are not healthy. Most students eat junk food as snacks, but a lot of students have some fruit every day. And most students like to eat apples, bananas and pears.

Good morning, everyone. I'm Miss Li. Here is the report of our eating survey. There are forty students in the survey. Most students eat healthy food. However, a lot of students don't have healthy snacks or drinks. More than half of the students drink enough water every day but a lot of students have more than two drinks with sugar. Our snacks are not healthy. Most students eat junk food as snacks, but a lot of students have some fruit every day. And most students like to eat apples, bananas and pears.

entry.title: 畅行unit2听力材料
entry.content:
Unit two, 单元检测

一、听力

(一)听句子，选图片。你将听到五个句子，请选出与所听句子内容相符的图片，有一幅图是多余的。每个句子读两遍。

1

Tim Simons won a gold medal.

Tim Simons won a gold medal.

2

Tom's dream is to be a surfer.

Tom's dream is to be a surfer.

3

He was the last runner to finish the race.

He was the last runner to finish the race.

4

Li Jia likes swimming very much.

Li Jia likes swimming very much.

5

She filled over 30 notebooks with her running records.

She filled over 30 notebooks with her running records.

(二)听短对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到五段对话，每段对话后有一个小题，请根据对话内容，选出最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

6

What did you do yesterday afternoon, Mike?

I played basketball with my friends.

What did you do yesterday afternoon, Mike?

I played basketball with my friends.

7

Hello, Lucy. Did Amy win the football game yesterday?

No. Cindy got a gold medal. And she was very excited.

Hello, Lucy. Did Amy win the football game yesterday?

No. Cindy got a gold medal. And she was very excited.

8

Why are you so happy?

Because our team scored three goals in the last 25 minutes.

Why are you so happy?

Because our team scored three goals in the last 25 minutes.

9

I would like to run every day to keep healthy. What about you, Mike?

I would like to play basketball after school every day.

I would like to run every day to keep healthy. What about you, Mike?

I would like to play basketball after school every day.

10

How did you start swimming, Tommy?

I wasn't very strong as a kid. So my parents took me to the swimming training school.

How did you start swimming, Tommy?

I wasn't very strong as a kid. So my parents took me to the swimming training school.

(三)听长对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到三段对话，请根据对话内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

请听第一段对话，回答第11至13小题。

Kangkang, did you watch the basketball game between Class One and Class Three?

Yes, it was a wonderful game. I was so excited.

Which team won the game?

Class One scored four and Class Three scored two. So Class One won the game.

Really? What exciting news!

Yeah, Class One did very well in the game. They tried their best.

That's great! I hope they will be better and better.

Kangkang, did you watch the basketball game between Class One and Class Three?

Yes, it was a wonderful game. I was so excited.

Which team won the game?

Class One scored four and Class Three scored two. So Class One won the game.

Really? What exciting news!

Yeah, Class One did very well in the game. They tried their best.

That's great! I hope they will be better and better.

请听第二段对话，回答第14至16小题。

Do you know about the Olympic Games Paris 2024?

Yes. It began on 26th July, 2024. And it lasted for 17 days.

Was there your favourite sports person?

Yes. I like Quan Hongchan best.She was only 17 years old that time. She did well during the games.

What else do you know about Quan Hongchan?

She won two gold medals during the games.

Great. We should learn from her.

You're right.

Do you know about the Olympic Games Paris 2024?

Yes. It began on 26th July, 2024. And it lasted for 17 days.

Was there your favourite sports person?

Yes. I like Quan Hongchan best.She was only 17 years old that time. She did well during the games.

What else do you know about Quan Hongchan?

She won two gold medals during the games.

Great. We should learn from her.

You're right.

请听第三段对话，回答第17 至20小题。

Sue, do you know anything about the marathon in our city last year?

Yeah. It was the first time to hold a marathon in our city.

Wow! Sounds great! How many people took part) in it?

Nearly 20,000 runners from 25 countries.

It must be very exciting.

Yeah, in order to make the runners feel relaxed and forget the tiredness, beautiful music was played during the competition.

Wow! That's cool. I hope to enter it next time.

Really? I will be there to cheer for you.

Sue, do you know anything about the marathon in our city last year?

Yeah. It was the first time to hold a marathon in our city.

Wow! Sounds great! How many people took part) in it?

Nearly 20,000 runners from 25 countries.

It must be very exciting.

Yeah, in order to make the runners feel relaxed and forget the tiredness, beautiful music was played during the competition.

Wow! That's cool. I hope to enter it next time.

Really? I will be there to cheer for you.

(四)听短文，选择最佳答案。你将听到一篇短文，请根据短文内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。短文读两遍。

Hello, everyone. Here comes the sports news from the No.3 Middle School. The first part is last Tuesday's eighth­grade football games. In the first game, Class 1 won five goals and Class 2 won two goals. In the second game, Class 3 won four goals and Class 4 didn't go at all. Class 4 needed more practice. In the third game, Class 1 won three goals and Class 3 won one goal. Class 1 was the final winner. Congratulations! And now comes the running race news. In the girls' 200­meter race last Friday, everyone thought the winner would be Kate or Lily. But Julia was the dark horse. Last year, Julia only got the sixth place, but this year she got the first place.

Hello, everyone. Here comes the sports news from the No.3 Middle School. The first part is last Tuesday's eighth­grade football games. In the first game, Class 1 won five goals and Class 2 won two goals. In the second game, Class 3 won four goals and Class 4 didn't go at all. Class 4 needed more practice. In the third game, Class 1 won three goals and Class 3 won one goal. Class 1 was the final winner. Congratulations! And now comes the running race news. In the girls' 200­meter race last Friday, everyone thought the winner would be Kate or Lily. But Julia was the dark horse. Last year, Julia only got the sixth place, but this year she got the first place.

(五)听短文，填信息。你将听到一篇短文，请根据短文内容，将所缺信息填入对应的横线上，每空一词。短文读三遍。

Hello, I'm Greg. I used to be thin. Last year I wanted to become strong, so I decided to try running. I trained hard and went running every day. But then there was something wrong with me. My legs and feet hurt so much. After that, I heard about a running group. I decided to join it. Later, I found that I preferred running with a group. It was great fun. Now I've made a lot of friends in the group. We knock around together even when we aren't running.

Hello, I'm Greg. I used to be thin. Last year I wanted to become strong, so I decided to try running. I trained hard and went running every day. But then there was something wrong with me. My legs and feet hurt so much. After that, I heard about a running group. I decided to join it. Later, I found that I preferred running with a group. It was great fun. Now I've made a lot of friends in the group. We knock around together even when we aren't running.

Hello, I'm Greg. I used to be thin. Last year I wanted to become strong, so I decided to try running. I trained hard and went running every day. But then there was something wrong with me. My legs and feet hurt so much. After that, I heard about a running group. I decided to join it. Later, I found that I preferred running with a group. It was great fun. Now I've made a lot of friends in the group. We knock around together even when we aren't running.

entry.title: 畅行unit1听力材料
entry.content:
Unit one, 单元检测

一、听力

(一)听句子，选图片。你将听到五个句子，请选出与所听句子内容相符的图片，有一幅图是多余的。每个句子读两遍。

1

Emily made a cake for her grandpa last night.

Emily made a cake for her grandpa last night.

2

To my surprise, the family were happy together.

To my surprise, the family were happy together.

3

I like playing with my dog after dinner every day.

I like playing with my dog after dinner every day.

4

There are different ways to fill a glass with water.

There are different ways to fill a glass with water.

5

Sarah was happy to read books with her brother yesterday.

Sarah was happy to read books with her brother yesterday.

(二)听短对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到五段对话，每段对话后有一个小题，请根据对话内容，选出最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

6

What do you often do at weekends, Li Ming?

I often play with my brother in a park. It's great.

What do you often do at weekends, Li Ming?

I often play with my brother in a park. It's great.

7

Do you want to come to my party the day after tomorrow?

Yes, I'd love to.

Do you want to come to my party the day after tomorrow?

Yes, I'd love to.

8

What do you like doing, Alex?

Playing games with friends. It can make me happy.

What do you like doing, Alex?

Playing games with friends. It can make me happy.

9

What do you do to help poor children at the Helping Hands Club?

We usually collect clothes from others and send them to the poor children.

What do you do to help poor children at the Helping Hands Club?

We usually collect clothes from others and send them to the poor children.

10

Hi, John. What a big smile on your face! Any good news?

Yeah. I got an A in my English study. I feel so happy.

Hi, John. What a big smile on your face! Any good news?

Yeah. I got an A in my English study. I feel so happy.

(三)听长对话，选择最佳答案。你将听到三段对话，请根据对话内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。每段对话读两遍。

请听第一段对话，回答第11至13小题。

Hi, Linda. How was your summer holiday?

Great! I spent it with my grandpa in a small town.

What did you do there?

I went fishing with him and we learnt a lot about nature. That was a surprising holiday.

Hi, Linda. How was your summer holiday?

Great! I spent it with my grandpa in a small town.

What did you do there?

I went fishing with him and we learnt a lot about nature. That was a surprising holiday.

请听第二段对话，回答第14至16小题。

Hi, Jim. Did you have fun at Maria's birthday party last night?

Yeah, it was so fun. We sang, danced and ate delicious cake. Why didn't you come last night, Judy?

I would like to, but I had to look after my little brother at home. He had a cold.

I'm sorry to hear that. What did you buy for Maria?

I bought a book for her. I hope she'll like it.

Hi, Jim. Did you have fun at Maria's birthday party last night?

Yeah, it was so fun. We sang, danced and ate delicious cake. Why didn't you come last night, Judy?

I would like to, but I had to look after my little brother at home. He had a cold.

I'm sorry to hear that. What did you buy for Maria?

I bought a book for her. I hope she'll like it.

请听第三段对话，回答第17至20小题。

Hi, Jane. What did you do last weekend?

I helped at an old people's home.

Whom did you go with?

My friends Kate and Berry.

What did you do there?

We did some cleaning, and read books to the old.

When will you go there again? I want to go with you.

I'm not sure. I'll call you if I go next time.

Today is Friday. What are you going to do this weekend?

Nothing much. Just stay at home and help my mother clean the room.

Hi, Jane. What did you do last weekend?

I helped at an old people's home.

Whom did you go with?

My friends Kate and Berry.

What did you do there?

We did some cleaning, and read books to the old.

When will you go there again? I want to go with you.

I'm not sure. I'll call you if I go next time.

Today is Friday. What are you going to do this weekend?

Nothing much. Just stay at home and help my mother clean the room.

(四)听短文，选择最佳答案。你将听到一篇短文，请根据短文内容，选出每个问题的最佳答案。短文读两遍。

My name is Gary. Before I was twelve, my family lived in the mountains. Our house was far from my school, and it took me one hour to walk to school every morning. It was a happy time for me because I could meet friends on the way and we would go to school together. There were about ninety students in my school. We spent most of our time playing. The mountains were our playground. I still remember different kinds of trees and flowers in different seasons. Everything was so interesting and beautiful. Even now, I still miss my life in the mountains.

My name is Gary. Before I was twelve, my family lived in the mountains. Our house was far from my school, and it took me one hour to walk to school every morning. It was a happy time for me because I could meet friends on the way and we would go to school together. There were about ninety students in my school. We spent most of our time playing. The mountains were our playground. I still remember different kinds of trees and flowers in different seasons. Everything was so interesting and beautiful. Even now, I still miss my life in the mountains.

(五)听短文，填信息。你将听到一篇短文，请根据短文内容，将所缺信息填入对应的横线上，每空一词。短文读三遍。

All families are different. Most families are small. But I have a big and happy family—my grandparents, my parents, my uncle, my sister, my little brother and I. My father and my uncle work in the same factory. My mom is a nurse in a hospital. We do many things together. We often take a family trip on weekends. Sometimes, we visit my grandparents in the country. We cook, eat and talk together. I love my family very much.

All families are different. Most families are small. But I have a big and happy family—my grandparents, my parents, my uncle, my sister, my little brother and I. My father and my uncle work in the same factory. My mom is a nurse in a hospital. We do many things together. We often take a family trip on weekends. Sometimes, we visit my grandparents in the country. We cook, eat and talk together. I love my family very much.

All families are different. Most families are small. But I have a big and happy family—my grandparents, my parents, my uncle, my sister, my little brother and I. My father and my uncle work in the same factory. My mom is a nurse in a hospital. We do many things together. We often take a family trip on weekends. Sometimes, we visit my grandparents in the country. We cook, eat and talk together. I love my family very much.
